name: Nextech AR – ARitize 3D
author: Nextech AR Solutions

sections.description:
Convert your 2D images into interactive, high-quality 3D/AR content. Make it easy for your shoppers to visualize your product in their space. Use ARitize 3D as your one-stop-shop for all your 3D model creation.

Increase your online conversion rate by 250% and decrease returns with dynamic 3D/AR, leaving your customers happier with their personalized product. To get started with your 3D/AR journey, Click here

Demo Store

App Features

Our AI powered platform is a game changer!

  • Increase conversions
  • Reduce product returns
  • Increase customer engagement
  • Attract more customers

Transform your online store into a dynamic virtual showroom

Allow your customers to see your products from every angle and position them in their own space prior to purchasing, leading to more conversions and less returns. It’s an exciting, immersive shopping experience that keeps customers more engaged, better informed and helps your brand stand out from the competition.

Nextech Support

For more info, please contact us

Check out this video:

Plugin is relying on a Nextech AR 3rd party as a service

3D plugin is the part of Aritize 3D system used for integrating Aritize 3D web application and Woo Commerce.
So plugin use the list of services below provided by the Aritize 3D web application:
– Nextech AR
– Aritize 3D

Please refer documentation with url below for term of use and privacy policy:
– AR solutions terms
– Nextech AR solutions privacy policy
sections.installation:
Minimum Requirements

  • PHP 7.2 or greater is recommended
  • MySQL 5.6 or greater is recommended

Manual installation

  1. Upload the entire aritize-3d folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the Plugins screen (Plugins > Installed Plugins).

You will find Aritize 3D menu in your WordPress admin screen.

Go to the Aritize 3D -> Settings, click Generated token
